name: Banana Split Cake II
author: Judy
summary: An easy no-bake sweet treat. Perfect for those hot summer months when turning the oven on is unbearable.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
directions: Combine the crushed vanilla wafers and melted margarine
Pat into the bottom of one 9x13 inch pan
Beat the cream cheese and confectioners' sugar together until light and fluffy
Spread over the top of the vanilla wafer crust
Spoon crushed pineapple over the cream cheese layer
Then layer sliced bananas over the pineapple
Cover with the non-dairy whipped topping and sprinkle top with chopped walnuts and maraschino cherries
Chill for at least 4 hours before serving
